Back:
Lasting for a very short time
Example: The joy of winning was ephemeral.

Having mixed feelings
Example: He felt ambivalent about moving to a new city.

Having or showing great knowledge
Example: The professor was known for his erudite lectures.

To make unclear
Example: The company tried to obfuscate its financial results.

Present everywhere
Example: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.
